1972.subject: HDEV
1972.descrlong: Capstone Seminar revolves around a research project. Students will conduct a close study of a particular area, e.g., juveniles and violence, parenting practices in bilingual families, or needs of non-English proficient elderly. Students will conduct a literature review, analyze a particular aspect of the field, and evaluate how particular theories and practices are conducted. (May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online.) (Credit/No Credit Available)
